warningMessage: Welcome to Aletheia! For you security, please change your password at least once.
passwordMatchErrorMessage: The two passwords that you entered do not match
totpCodeDescription: This is your authenticator app secret. Use it if you can not scan the QR code.
totpSectionDescription: Add a TOTP Authenticator App to your account to improve your account security. Popular Authenticator Apps are <0>LastPass</0> and Google Authenticator (<1>iOS</1>, <2>Android</2>).
totpIncorectCodeMessage: The provided authentication code is invalid, please try again.
